Texto: 
decreased breath sounds in the right upper lobe. 
crackles in the left lung base.
opacity in region of the right upper lobe.
right upper lobe atelectasis
• atelectasis
• lobar collapse
• bronchial obstruction
• consolidation from infection
22 y.o. man, bedridden inpatient  after multiple system trauma, to include previous left hemo-pneumothorax.
